title: "People will die": a country hospital fears it won't cope with coronavirus
description: What does it take to prepare for a pandemic? Many hospitals around the world are already overwhelmed by patients infected with COVID19. Australian doctors and nurses are bracing for something most of them have never faced before. In our country hospitals, res…
